Grandpa had a special dish that he always cooked for his grandkids when they came to visit. Today, it was a special day; the grandkids were coming over! Grandpa was busy preparing his special dish so they could all enjoy it.
He gathered all the ingredients and began cooking. Grandpa was very creative, and added a few extra ingredients to give the dish some extra flavor. He smiled to himself, thinking of how much his grandkids would love the yummy surprise.

, and asked, "What is the news?"

They smiled and hugged the rich man. From that day on, the children always waited eagerly for the man to tell them some news.

and happily grabbed the whip. Together the two boys played with the whip, running around, laughing and having a wonderful time.
But then, something strange happened. John was whacking the whip harder than Tim was and it was starting to hurt a bit. 
Tim said, "John, please be more gentle with the whip. Hard whacks can really hurt!"
John was sorry and nodded his head. 
The two best friends hugged each other and shared the whip more softly. They smiled and both felt very happy to be together. 
The end.
